website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for comfortable carrying, the features on this diaper bag backpack have you covered.
pros: Lots of multi-functional pockets, changing pad, and two stroller straps offer on-the-go convenience
Made from premium oxford fabric, which is both durable and scratch- and water-resistant
Great bag to keep things organized during travel
Very affordable, with a 100% refund for one year
cons: The zippers tend to break with some consumers, and the zipper material quality is a possible culprit

customer_reviews.title: Better than Land diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a LAND diaper bag last year and was so excited about it but unfortunately the quality did not stand up and it was beginning to fall apart. I really did love the bag so I was going to order another one when I came across this kea baby brand that looked similar and decided to give it a try. I love the larger size and extra pockets that this bag has. Can easily fit everything I need for my three-year-old and baby plus I love the backpack style! I am very pleased with this purchase and will update with time once I see how this bag holds up to daily use.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Well made and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag! It’s not too large but when you unzip the top it really opens up and has tons of storage compartments and space! I really love the matching changing pad that comes with it too. The bag seems durable and the interior is a wonderful waterproof and easily wipeable material. I’ll be purchasing one of these as a gift as well!
customer_reviews.author: Ashbrooke

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of this style diaper bag and ended up choosing this one because I like the front pocket for keys, phone, ect and it had good reviews. I so far have LOVED it. It is light weight and can hold a ton of stuff. My old backpack diaper bag fit way less in it and was much more bulky. I like the color and design and so far it has held up great. The zippers do need to be used a couple of times before they run smoother but that is no biggy. I think it's a great bag and at a great price! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Sooo roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time reviewing diaper backpacks before I made the delicious to purchase this one. At first when I received this diaper bag, I was worried that it would be too big. However, after using it for more than a month now, I'm finding that it's just the right size. I am super pleased with the quality of the material and zippers, the sturdiness of it, and the fact that it makes everything very easy to find and keep organized. As a busy mom of 4, I need all of the help I can get! Bottom line: Purchase this diaper bag. You won't regret it! Thank you for the great bag, KeaBabies.
customer_reviews.author: C. Yuppa

customer_reviews.title: Spacious!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this diaper bag! The inside is very spacious with lots of organizing pockets and you can open the main compartment from the back side. Also, it has three bottle holding spots instead of just one like most. Material is good quality and it looks really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jay E.

customer_reviews.title: loved it for a litte bit
customer_reviews.text: loved this for a little bit but the plastic clips that hold and adjust the straps break very easily only used for about a month and used maybe a handful of times and one side broke and there is no way to even fix it very disappointing did not even get moneys worth out of it waste of money would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: great customer service and improved product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this diaper bag to go to Florida. Storage capacity is great. I never had to over pack this bag like I have other ones so I was very surprised and disappointed that less than 2 months after the purchase it is ripped on a seam. Disappointed Update - after contacting the company, they willingly sent out a replacement. The replacement one has had no issues and we really like the bag. We used fabric tape on the old torn one and use that as our back up. Customer service is great! Give the bag a try. It is amazing in design, well thought out and plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: Angie p

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Zippers
customer_reviews.text: I bought the diaper bag for a baby shower gift. I opened the package and found that non of zippers were working properly. The zippers were all closed and yet the middle section were open. you would need to pull the zipper back and zip again for it to get back in track. Not good at all when all the zippers had the same problem. I'm returning the diaper bag. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: Great but smells
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bag has tons of space and the changing pad is also pretty large. The material and zippers seems like they will hold up for a long time as well. My only complaint is that when I got this item it smelled horrible. It was like it had been sitting in a damp basement for a long time. I have it airing out now to get rid of the smell. I hope this works!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Broken Zipper(s)
customer_reviews.text: This item came quickly, I was so excited for this backpack as it had so many great reviews, but when I got the itme my excitement quickly went down hill as the main pocket zipper is broken and came off from just opening the package , and the zipper by the insulated pocket is rather wonky and looks like it will give out in just a few zips. Now I need to reorder a diaper backpack and I need it for Halloween . Not sure if I should take a chance and reorder from this company or try another back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Machuca

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper bag for two!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bag for two. Has multiple places to store bottles that are easily accessible from the front. Easy access from the back zip pocket to get to diapers or things you normally store at the bottom. This bag held so much for both of my babies and is still comfortable to have on my back.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this bag EXCEPT the zippers. The zippers were obviously cheap - noticed it from the get-go. The company sent an email upon receipt saying something like "the zippers are new; you need to run them back and forth a few times for optimal use" - weird - when have you ever had to do that to get a zipper to work?! I did that, but the zipper still broke under normal use within a couple of months. I returned it and got a very similar bag for another $8 or so that I expect will last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Diaper Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my sister-in-law and I am so jealous of her because of it. I wish I had gotten this before my son was born. The material is beautiful and feels like it would be easy to wipe clean. There is so much room on this inside of the bag. The way the back opens is so handy, too, since you can pull larger objects out without struggling. The color is perfect since it can match anything. The shoulder straps have a nice amount of padding as well.
customer_reviews.author: Casey M. Keathley

customer_reviews.title: Inside material is thin and cheap, spacious bag
customer_reviews.text: Have had this bag for not even 3 months and one of the inside pockets ripped. I was able to sew it closed but worry the others will eventually rip as well. I do love how spacious this bag is and am disappointed in the quality of the inside material.
customer_reviews.author: Tisernia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When I first received my baby bag I was extremely excited and thrilled at how much I could pack in it and just overall how convenient it appeared to be...right out of the box it had some stitching issues, which I chose to ignore and simply restitch myself. However just a week later, another area appeared and the strap began to fall off. It would’ve been a great bag had the stitching been better and it not have basically fallen apart within a week of having.. Update: after receiving a replacement bag and I totally satisfied...it’s been a month or so and the stitching is in great shape and the bag is all that I imagined!
customer_reviews.author: LaTanya Raffington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper backpack.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack with loads of room. The material is rugged, but zippers could use some work. When I got I immediately opened and noticed the back panel zipper was a bit off. The zipper has a sharp corner to go around to gain access to the inside. I tried a few times and it seems to be skipping a few teeth. Hoping to not have issues when used in practical applications. We will see. Overall this is the best diaper backpack I have owned and I'm so excited for the baby to come and start using. Thank you for the very fast delivery, I'm talking a day and half on a lightning deal. KeaBabies is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kurpas

customer_reviews.title: Great for a busy mom with lots of littles
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fourth time mom and know what I want in a diaper bag at this point. I have a 4,3,1 and newborn. This bag holds all that I need for them and myself. I love that the top stays nice and open. I gave it 4 stars because after a couple weeks of use, some of the stitching is coming out, and the zippers don’t always zip very smoothly. All around, I love the backpack style, all the pockets, and zippered pockets. Great big bag for all the things I need.
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: Bigger on the inside!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is like a TARDIS. It is way bigger on the inside. I have twins and you can imagine it would be difficult to tote around all the supplies for a day, or even just an afternoon, out. This bag holds it all. And!! It doesn't crush the contents or cause worry about the stress on the zipper. The zippers are surprisingly strong and durable. I have over packed it several times and no problems. I'll post pics soon!
customer_reviews.author: April Baxa

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this diaper bag sooo much! Only thing I would change is the top zipper and a better diaper pocket. I cannot close this bag while holding my baby. I have to take out what I need for public changes instead of bringing the bag into the restroom with me. Definitely not great if you want something that can close with one hand. I love the style, the outside side pockets that don’t have zippers so i can put my water bottle there and easily take the wipes out, aaaand how huge it is! My last diaper bag was considered xlarge and I can definitely fit more in this one. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Josh F.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, functional, and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I love the functionality and style of this diaper bag! Wide opening let's you access stuff easier and the zipper on the back lets you grab any stuff from the bottom of the bag. The side pocket for wipes awesome! My only concern is durability, the straps seem very cheaply made and might give out over time, but we'll see. So far I love it! Got it in black so dirt or stains won't be an issue as much. My hubby likes it too and wouldn't mind carrying it compared to an more baby-ish diaper bag we had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Jontue

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for multiple kids and dads
customer_reviews.text: For a woman it’s a big diaper bag but perfect for daddies! I love it comes with the changing mat especially if a dad has to improvise. It’s big enough to hold everything from formula, clothing, toys, diapers etc! So many different compartment spaces I even like it can fit 8 oz bottles and is insulated. Again it’s really big..can definitely be used for more than 1 kid and I would recommend this to any first time parent or any parent. There are others that look like this and I own however it’s not the same but this one is daddy’s bag and if it wasn’t so big on me it would be mommy’s bag
customer_reviews.author: Shonnie C

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and absolutely love it! I cannot believe how much room it has! I. I carried another bag for 17 months always digging around and having to pull everything out to find stuff! We have another baby on the way so we wanted something with more room. It fits everything I had in my old diaper bag and it looks practically empty! Great buy especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile bag!
customer_reviews.text: We have loved this diaper bag and use it a couple of times a week but I generally leave it in the car or at the bottom of the stroller. It has been easy to keep clean and has good storage, and lots of space. After months of use the bag started tearing and the company refunded my money so kindly. I think we must have had a small imperfection since this doesn’t seem to be an ongoing issue. I would highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, big diaper backpack, but my one issue with it is the zipper. It's not easy to open with one hand. When I'm holding my baby and trying to get something from this backpack, I get so frustrated when the zipper won't cooperate. I usually am using one had to open it and one hand to hold the baby, so it's important for it to be able to open fairly easily with one hand. This goes for opening it and closing it. I love the amount of space it has in it and how much can fit, but I don't have it overly packed and I still can't open the zipper easily with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this diaper bag on cyber Monday and expected subquality for the price and could not have been more surprised to see how high quality the product is. The bag is very durable, easy to clean and carry. It's made with a water resistant fabric and comes with a changing pad. The inside has an abundance of space, which I easily fit items for my two littles ones with space left over. I was also impressed with the metal bars that reinforce the opening at the top. Extremely happy with this product and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Weymer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Spacious Bag
customer_reviews.text: Where was this bag five years ago, seriously this bag is just awesome, it fits almost everything, and love the fact there are various pockets and compartments. Also it's an ease to walk around with it, especially at the airports. Like the fact you can use the additional strap to tie it on the stroller. Overall best value for the buck, would definitely recommend all the parents to get this, especially the fathers as it looks cool to carry around
customer_reviews.author: DarkKnightRyder

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying, if you are looking for a large capacity bag, this is probably for you! That is the one thing I love about it. I'm torn if I want to keep it or try to find something better. Here are my pros and cons for this bag: Pros: -LOTS of space!! -Wide Opening top -Comes with changing pad Cons: -Bag feels kind of flimsy and cheap to me.. (This could be because it was shipped folded in half, but the zippers feel cheaply made too) -No key clip to attach car keys -No real "mom" pocket -Not sure how others fit wipes in the wipe pocket.. maybe it's the brand? But I cannot make them fit.
customer_reviews.author: KHage25

customer_reviews.title: Zipper needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is a backpack and it has several pockets and storage. However, the zipper is super long across and can be difficult to open, especially with one hand. I don’t know about you but I tend to do most activities one handed now that I am a multitasking mom so it’s quite a frustration. Otherwise it’s got great capacity and it’s easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Sipes

customer_reviews.title: Spacious and Durable
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried several diaper bags for our twins and this is the best one by far! It has lots of pockets and space to hold diapers, wipes, extra clothes, bottles, hats, sunglasses, hearing protection (for parades & concerts), toys, pacifiers, and an extra shirt for mom. The fabric is not showing any wear despite months of daily use and it keeps the contents of the bag dry in the rain. I would recommend this bag to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: JustaNurseinDC

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for 2 kids stuff ages 2 m and 18 m..
customer_reviews.text: I didn't give a review on durability because I just got this yesterday.. but I can say I really like it is big enough for two kids stuff in it including 1 outfit and diapers for each due to me having a 2month old and a 18 month old not to mention I can still store a regular can of baby formula I love this bag so far is the best storage bag I found for my kids needs and mine really happy will be buying again for a gift. I really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Customer2986

customer_reviews.title: Best bag on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough great things about this bag! I love that I can fit everything I need for my twin girls in it. Its durable, super stylish, and made with organization in mind being that there is a slot for everything. The inside material easily wipes down and there is an outside compartment that allows access to the inside to avoid digging through my items.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diaper bag! So much space and lots of pockets for organizing! Also the diaper changing mat is fantastic! Long, thick, and easy to clean! The only thing I would change would be a softer fabric on the straps or something. It’s a little scratchy against my neck. I’m hoping the general wear will soften the fabric some or I will try and get some covers or something for this area. This is definitely my favorite diaper bag that I have and good value!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Collins

customer_reviews.title: Nice spacious bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diaper bag. Fits 3 glass Dr. Browns bottles in the insulated pockets. A wipes package works in the tissue pocket on the side. There are many pockets and zipper compartments on this bag. The main compartment is really spacious. I cloth diaper and can fit quite a few cloth diapers inside with room for many other items. There is an easy access zipper on the back that makes it easy to grab items on the bottom of the bag. No more digging. Bag seems nice and sturdy and well made. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ALS229

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this bag and was a little afraid of what the quality would be like since the price is so good. I had just returned a bag that looked similar and returned it due to poor quailty. When I opened this bag I was impressed! The zippers and the material of the bag feel sturdy. It easily fits my Spectra s2 breast pump (which is what I bought it for) and there is plenty of room to also put my other supplies in it as well! I haven't used it day to day yet, as I just got it, but so far I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and perfect for parents!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color, size and feel for the product. It’s an extremely sturdy product and I’ve read so many good reviews on the product. I love that it’s a great look for moms and dads. I have 2 kids and the back zipper to be able to reach stuff on the bottom portion of the bag will be amazing. Baby #2 isn’t here yet so we haven’t used the backpack to the full capacity, but I’m excited! I will update my review at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: Estella Escobar

customer_reviews.title: zipperd back pocket access is a plus!
customer_reviews.text: i am in love with this diaper bag. It has alot of storage space, and mostly the most important thing for myself as a mommy of 6 is the zipper pocket that give you access the inside. If your item is not up top you can unzip and get tp your item on the middle or bottom of the diaper bag through this zipper pocket! which is a BIG plus for a diaper bag :) highly recommend it i use it for my two and one year old combined and still have some space left!
customer_reviews.author: JayjayFamilia

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Wanted! Wide Opening, Sturdy, Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bag is AWESOME! I’d originally gone w a bag 3x more expensive bc it claimed to stay open w a wide opening. I returned that previous one (a skiphop version) after seeing my sister with this one! It has a great sturdy material, it has a wide opening and it props open so you don’t have to rummage around as much! Exactly what I’d been hoping for AND at 1/3 the price of many other bags!
customer_reviews.author: T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Organized
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can get more organized with this bag compared to my old one, and keep it that way. The back zipper allows me to get whats on the bottom without flipping through all the contents and making a mess inside the bag. Side pockets hold my tall water bottle without fear of them falling out which i love. I dont need the insulated front pocket for bottles but i love the pockets for other things.
customer_reviews.author: KDR

customer_reviews.title: Kinda not what I expected 🤔
customer_reviews.text: Color is nice, I'm a Dad ...its not really what I wanna carry lol..its a baby bag... What I dont like...it needs more PAD on the shoulder straps it's the 21st century... Other than that ...look ok the mom is happy
customer_reviews.author: spirocz34

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Baby isn’t due for another 7 weeks so I haven’t put it through the ringer yet. But on first inspection, I’m really happy with this bag. I saw it a couple of weeks ago as a deal of the day but I got distracted and forgot to order it & missed the deal. I was super happy when I saw it back on sale! My husband loves the colour and the bonus change pad. It’s deceptively big, such a large main compartment with a bunch of side and front pockets. I figure even if it only lasts a short while, it’s excellent value for money at $20!
customer_reviews.author: NESS_AUZ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: After seeing so many options, I decided to buy this bag as it met most of my needs... Especially being spacious and holding certain number of baby bottles... the package came perfectly packed and new.. I will update with more details and pictures after our baby comes. As we will start using it after that.. Overall great first impression and will be recommending it to friends..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick good quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack! my wife uses it all the time for the kids. everything can be reached easily without any hassle of having to dig for diapers, wipes, or even bottles. We have a 5 month old and a toddler so you can imagine how much stuff needs to be packed when going places but this backpack holds everything with room to spare!if you don't have it then get it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: Ive had almost every style diaper bag you can own and decided the backpack version worked best for us. I decided to upgrade to a new one when baby #3 came along because my original one had some major wear and tear. I AM SO GLAD I GOT THE KEABABY BRAND! It has the same concept as my original diaper bag but this one has more room and pockets so I am easily carrying things for my 4 year old, 2 year old, 3 month old, AND my things. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Cody Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to zip, doesn't fit water bottle in insulated area
customer_reviews.text: Bag itself is durable and doesn't show stains like some others. It's very large and holds diapers and clothing changes for both kids. I was disappointed at how hard it is to zip up, it's nearly impossible with one hand and even harder if someone else is wearing it while you're trying to get in. Also I hate that the insulated front zipper doesn't hold a standard size water bottle. The whole reason for my purchase was to keep my infants bottles and toddlers water bottles cold. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: allie botko

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for with this bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks great and has a large storage capacity. However, my baby wasn’t even a month old before we experienced the first tear. The changing pad pocket trim has come completely off!! A month later, the insulation from one of the bottle pockets separated and we hardly use bottles or need to transport one. I was disappointed and have since bought a new bag from a different company. I know this is a cheap bag but I expected it to last longer than 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Henson

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate. Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful backpack. The color is spot on. I love the neutral color. Great for me and daddy! It's durable and there's TONS of room. There is a little opening on back of backpack so if it's hanging on stroller you can access from the back instead of the top. The front bottle holder pouch is insulated too if you bottle feed. Great purchase. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Scott

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought a bag like this before in a different color when my daughter was born and I fell in love. I used it soo much that the small plastic things used to adjust the straps broke on both sides. I love how spacious it is on the inside and really does keep my daughters bottles and sippy cup cold in the insulated pouches in the front. As a bonus, it looks like a regular backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine N Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: So roomy and love all the pockets!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size diaper bag! With my first I had this gigantic purse type bag 6 years ago and things just got lost in there, plus the bag just flopped around with no structure. This one has pockets all over and I love the firm structure of the top opening. I’ve already started packing for the hospital and I have a large blanket, swaddle blanket, burp rag, wipes, diapers, some sample lotions and ointments, and there is still room for more! Plus it comes with the changing pad that fits perfectly in a pocket with the wipes. I love it and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great diaper bag for a great price! I love the extra pockets, all the storage space and the back area to open it up to reach for something at the bottom and it’s so easy and cute to carry around. Unfortunately after about 6 months of use, all the inside pockets have ripped from the seams making them not very usable since everything falls out of them. Besides that, I loved this bag.
customer_reviews.author: courtney williams

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a roomy bag that's perfect for multiple kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag to help carry all of my stuff and my kids stuff (I have 6 and 4 year-old boys and recently gave birth to our 3rd boy). Very roomy bag and love all the pockets. I liked that it came with a diaper changing mat and the front pocket holds three bottles... great for baby bottles and my older boys' Thermos Funtainers. Great bag for the price. I've been using it for a couple of weeks but find the backpack so nice to keep my hands free to corral my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Dawg Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: So much room!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gym bag. So many pockets!! Even after having it for awhile I continued to find pockets. The pockets on the side aren't super durable.. Have had one rip at the bottom so it's unusable and I was unable to fix it. The fabric is pretty thick or else I'd try to sew it. I can fit 3 different outfits with a thick towel and still have some room for more.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wilbur

customer_reviews.title: BEST BAG EVER
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law and my brother LOVES this bag. I got it for them for my nephew that was being born. I was on diaper bag duty. Pros: -Goes with every outfit -It is gender neutral for both the parents and the baby - Very comfortable. It is a backpack so you have less to carry in your arms - Has bottle insulation! SO awesome! -Lots of room to store things -Has a side pocket just for the baby wipes It is just great. I have no cons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doubles as my pump bag
customer_reviews.text: I have always carried a backpack rather than a purse and when I found it it truly the perfect diaper bag. I had to try and pack for myself and my daughter for a flight out of state to visit family. This bag was perfect for our flight and still continues to be. I got a weeks worth of clothing, four bottles, 10 diapers, a pack of wipes, a few toys and two blankets and STILL had room for my own snacks for the flight. It has since became our only bag. I even use it for my pump on work days, just opening the back compartment to let out the plug and tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Bonniejane

customer_reviews.title: Love the size but needs better stitch work... 3.5stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the size of the bag, it’s big without being too bulky and has lots of room on the inside the only issue I have with this bad is that we’re the handles are have started to untangle, the stitching is starting to come loose Edit: so this is now 9months that I have this bag and after 2months it started to shed like certain parts started to unravel which wasn’t a big deal but now one of the arms are completely unraveled and off..
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Can’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed when I first opened my package and saw just how large this bag is. I love all of the pockets and compartments this thing has. With my first baby, I had a regular diaper bag and got tired of digging through that thing to find something that worked it’s way to the bottom of the bag. I generally carry a lot of stuff and that just became a hassle, but I love how this also has a pocket in the back to reach things that fell deep in the bag so you don’t have to pull EVERYTHING out. I can’t wait until baby #2 gets here and I can put this thing to the test.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: Update 8/14/19, I contacted the manufacturer in reference to the backpack being defective and sent pictures. They immediately contacted me back, apologized for the inconvenience and with in 3 days sent a new replacement backpack. Customer service 5 stars!!!! (It’s just going on 4 months old. The backpack diaper bag began unraveling and I’ve had to stop using it. It holds everything just as stated but, I think we ended up with a bad one. The tear is right in the seam and is spreading each time you put the backpack. Must replace !!!)
customer_reviews.author: Reba F. Gomes

customer_reviews.title: Good capacity, but zippers do not hold well
customer_reviews.text: This bag was good while it lasted. One of the main zippers for the main compartment broke, and I've only used this bag for a total of 8 months. The handle strap also does not hold the weight of the bag when hanging on the stroller handle. 3 out of 5 stars overall. I most likely will not buy again when time comes to replace my diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Arbey26

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Love that it’s not to big or bulky like other diaper bags! I just wished it had something to were I could hang it on the stroller without buying one of those big hooks or without putting it underneath in the stroller basket! But other than that it’s pretty good! Has lots of space the side pockets are big! A little too big but I don’t mind it! I really love the changing pad it comes with! Really durable! This bag is well made!
customer_reviews.author: Maritza E.

customer_reviews.title: Love Keababies!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought numerous keababies products and have never been disappointed. This hands down the best diaper bag I've owned, and I'm on baby boy #3. It's got enough room to hold everything you could possibly want or need for baby, and several pockets to keep things organized and easy to find. The material is very durable and heavy duty. I highly recommend this diaper bag, it's the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Charla Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Keababy diaper bag and upon first receiving it it’s large, sturdy, and has lots of big, deep pockets. It seems very easy to keep organized and has a good sized changing pad. I like that when you open the main compartment it has a metal frame to keep the bag open wide and I love that there’s a zipper in back to access the bottom of the bag without taking everything out. Just waiting on baby to get here and will review it further then.
customer_reviews.author: lk7

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a month I think, and in the beginning the zipper wouldn't close right, some teeth wouldn't interlock properly but it came with a note that said to play with it a few times to get it warmed up or something. It doesn't do it anymore so I guess after using it more it breaks in how it's supposed to. I like this backpack, it's efficient and convenient for me or my husband to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS .
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this . Super spacious I could fit two stacks of diapers . Wipes , can of formula , puffs container , oatmeal container . PLUS a lot more . And still had room for more . The diaper change mat is also amazing most diaper changing mats are super cheap . Never really used them . But this one is amazing . Best diaper bag I’ve had for both my boys . AND I’ve had probably over 10.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria sapp

customer_reviews.title: It’ll do
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s great. Big pockets, lots of storage and nice black color. The one thing that I HATE is that you absolutely cannot zip this up with one hand. As busy parents I need to be able to do things with one hand and I can’t do that with this backpack. It’ll work for now but we might eventually upgrade to something else later.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Mettler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality -- not worth the low price
customer_reviews.text: I knew this was terrible quality right after we started using it. After 10 months of moderate to light use, the bag totally fell apart. As you can see in the pictures, a seam busted and one zipper totally busted. I gave it two stars because it is a good size and has some nice features. If you want this diaper bag, just pay a little more and get a Hap Tim diaper bag. They look similarly, but are much higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: this was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend expecting a baby. it was on her registry and honestly i probably wouldn't have bought this for myself but when it showed up i was very surprised. It was huge inside and has plenty of pockets. it felt nice and durable. Her baby is not here yet but i am sure this will be a great bag!
customer_reviews.author: ashleexox576

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap broke on first day
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with how sturdy everything felt. Like the color and love all the little storage pockets. I bought a cheaper backpack one year ago that wore out quickly so I spent just a few more dollars on this. It had many great reviews. However, my first day of use and the shoulder strap on the right hand side ripped halfway! I did not over load the bag. You can see how much leftover space there is. I’m 33 weeks pregnant and can assure you it’s not heavy! Lol Hoping it is a singular defect and am willing to try a replacement. Will update upon receiving.
customer_reviews.author: octME

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! The material has very good quality... I’m blessed that the bag isn’t more expensive! I have a one year old and will have a newborn in a few weeks. I am confident with the space in this bag. There will be room for my newborns stuff! Pockets are very intentional and helpful. The part for bottles I use for other things since we just breastfeed. Doesn’t feel bulky when you wear on your back. Love how the main pocket opens wide and how the inside material is cream. I can see everything I need.
customer_reviews.author: shannel

customer_reviews.title: Sporty with great storage capacity
customer_reviews.text: This bag looks durable and contains great storage capacity! Sporty look and gray color scheme makes the bag gender neutral! Small Note: I think the bag we received had been returned to Amazon and resold. Though tags were still intact gift giving cards and paper were found inside... Will be contacting Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I love the space and pockets of this bag. We used it to take to amusement parks, as we are annual passholders. However, it has always been difficult to zip after getting something out while out and about. The top zipper broke in less than a year. Would expect it to last longer. Would have given it a higher overall score if it lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: christyadelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for cloth diapering!
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far! Haven't been able to test it's durability yet but appears to be very good quality. I can fit everything for a day out. Cloth diapering means a lot of diaper bags don't cut it as they take up much more room but this one does the job! Love the pocket on the back to access items on the bottom. Best part is the water bottle holder!!! Most diaper bags don't have one.
customer_reviews.author: samanthajo98

customer_reviews.title: Awesome diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I love how much space this diaper bag has. I have another bag that looks very similiar that I've been using for a few months and I like this one so much more! It's comfortable to wear, the middle storage space holds a lot of things without the bag feeling bulky. It really helps the weight distribute evenly. My only concern is that some of the zippers did arrive off track but once I used the zippers for the first time, the problem seemed to resolve. I will keep an eye on their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Tinetta

customer_reviews.title: Usable
customer_reviews.text: I like this diaper bag better than the other one I had but there’s nothing special about it. It does get the job done but it doesn’t have that much space to fit everything I need when taking my baby out somewhere. I wish it was a tiny bit bigger and it should have more colors to pick from.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: I made a video for this review about how much I love it but it would not load. #1) I have a different brand backpack and my husband realized he can’t fit it and I can’t fit my baby’s fuzzy blanket & all the things we need. With KeaBabies he wears comfortably and it fits the blanket plus has pockets for my phone and wallet (cause we won’t carry purses anymore). #2) Fabric is durable and so is the inside fabric with tons of pockets. #3) Back pocket access for the bottom of the bag and there is a metal rim to help it not fold down on you.
customer_reviews.author: Itzak Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good space, zipper issues, good customer service support
customer_reviews.text: The zippers broke within a few months. It costs almost as much as the diaper bag did to fix them. So we’ll be lookin for a new diaper bag, I loved the rear access and how to the top opens up all the way, but I’m not willing to re-buy it very 6 months. *edit* customer service reached out to me and offered to replace or refund the diaper bag even though it was beyond the 60 day window. I really appreciate their support and help. We’ll give the bag a try again with baby number 2, because it’s still my favorite as far as accessibility and features.
customer_reviews.author: gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Broken strap
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and the strap was broken and there was a pen in one of the pockets. I’m pretty sure this was used. It would be a great diaper bag if not broken, the color was spot on and it is a great size, the pockets are good sized and the zippers worked great. Just disappointed that the strap is broken and it was used.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Landers Nemitz

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: Looked good on arrival. Large storage. On day 1 of use (after carrying for 2 hours) the stitching for the front pocket already is splitting. Looking at stitching, it will be hard to seamlessly fix. Uncertain if this just really poor quality control? Otherwise, bag would have been great. Straps aren’t the most supportive and it would be nice to have a mommy pocket accessible on the backside. And it would have been nice if the side pocket that allows for wipes access had initial stitching to allow for use without a big hole there.
customer_reviews.author: Louise T. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Love the bag but its falling apart after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this diaper bag it holds alot of stuff! I have had 4 diaper bags and this one is the best of all of them. But I do have one issue with it. I have had it for only a couple months and the top stitching is coming apart and the shoulder strap is coming off also.
customer_reviews.author: Alaina Smalley

customer_reviews.title: great built but not quality
customer_reviews.text: The price is great with this built! A lot of functional pocket and its convenient. However the material especially shoulder belt hurts my skin as its rough material and design. If you use this with long sleeves, it may be ok but I won't wear sleeveless clothes if I carry this bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Nice size but quality is fair. Awesome customer service! Will shop again with this company!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Lactation Consultant and bought the bag to do my home visit consults. It’s a nice size. It fits everything I need for a visit however the snap that holds the handles together broke before I even got to use the bag. This was disappointing to me. This makes me wonder if the bag will hold up now. Edited after contacting company. The company responded immediately to my issue and is making it good. Sending me another bag. I’ll shop again with this company. Excellent customer service speaks volumes! Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keababies Diaper Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love, love how spacious this bag is. I bought this item because I saw that my brother had one and when I saw the inside of it; I said to myself “I need to have this bag.” I’m so happy with my purchase and the quality of the bag as well. Mommies out there, you need this bag. The price is really affordable and I’m sure is going to meet all your expectations. Give it a try, you won’t regret it. A very happy mommy to be and customer.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, great price, and everything you are looking for in a diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the space and capacity to hold so much stuff. I bought this because I have an 11 month old and expecting again in two months. With two babies, I will need a larger diaper bag and this is everything I want in one. It looks really nice and slick too which is a bonus!! Love the colour and the design and not to mention the price! Highly recommend this to all parents.
customer_reviews.author: Kace721

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible quality for a great price. I looked at many options and I am glad I chose this one. Lots of room for everything you need for baby without being too bulky. Straps also adjust easily, which is a big bonus for me because my husband and I are so different in size.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson P.

customer_reviews.title: Lacking quality... other wise it would be perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely wanted to love this bag and for the price it couldn’t be beat.....it came and I did love it! however, I’m so sad after only 2 weeks the material is ripping. I also noticed the zippers are rough to zip up and down and feel like they won’t last long. Moral of the story spend more on better quality. I’m still using the bag until I can’t anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rose Grubbs

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room, cheap price, High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality, cute for boy or girl and Huge! This bag has room for all of your baby needs and more! Comes with a changing pad. There's tons of side compartments and lots of zippers and pockets inside. A must have for anyone with little ones. You will not be disappointed! Will grow with baby. Only thing I dislike is the zipper is kind of odd.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa B.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish AND functional
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I have a diaper bag that works just fine, but with 2 kids and an international trip coming up, I wanted something that would be functional and stylish. The other backpack gets really bulky when full. I’m a petite female and it looks like I’m going to tip over backwards! The keababies backpack has a more compact profile with the same storage capacity. I love the easy access to wipes (no more rummaging frantically for wipes), and the huge side pocket for TWO water bottles. My kids are done with bottles, so I’ll probably use the front pocket for quick snacks/small toys and the zippered pocket for my wallet and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Anny Chen

customer_reviews.title: A Bag with a lot of room to pack everything
customer_reviews.text: Very versatile bag that the moms or dads can carry for baby. Has compartments to separate your bottles, wipes etc. When you unzip the top of the bag it completely expands the bag out. This makes it much easier to reach in and retrieve what you need without removing everything from the bag. Heavy duty material, straps and zippers. Awesome bag. Would absolutely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect diaper bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag!!! It’s large enough so my husband does not feel weird wearing it (he’s 6 foot). It’s very spacious and everything is easy to access because of the wide top opening. The separate diaper changing pad is awesome for public restrooms and people’s houses. We use the front insulated pockets all the time to store breast milk. I’ve even kept my own drinks in there and it keeps everything chilled. Highly recommend! I got The black and although it could be softer, the material seems like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s really stiff and uncomfortable to wear and you can’t fit larger bottles (only standard) in the bottles spots.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great design, poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to use this backpack when my daughter was born in August. The design of this bag is great. I love all of the pockets and large storage compartment. However, I have only used it for two months now and the bag is falling apart. The seam unraveled in the bottle pocket. The plastic piece on the backpack strap holding it together just randomly busted while wearing it, rendering this backpack useless. I wish it was more durable because now I’m scrambling to find another one to purchase since I can no longer use it. Waste of money unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of use this thing is ripping at the seams. Poorly made, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag!
customer_reviews.text: Got this in the mail today and I was pleasantly surprised! This bag is much bigger than I expected! There are lots of pockets and storage areas, an insulated compartment in the front for drinks. The pictures for this product show bottles, but I can put 3 full sized travel cups in them easily. The bag is made from really attractive, quality canvas. I am very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Spacious bag
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this bag yet, but bought it to upgrade from the bulky diaper bag I used with my first child. It's larger than what I was wanting, but I love all the pockets and storage space. I also love that my husband can carry it and that it has the buttons to attach to the stroller handle. Once we use it I will be able to give a more accurate opinion, but initially it seems like a great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Big but cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely the biggest diaper bag you can find on amazon!! B However, it’s not a high quality bag, it’s super flimsy and doesn’t even have padding in the bottom, it’s just fabric. The zippers aren’t great. I’m disappointed in it, but I’m keeping it because it’s by far the biggest one I’ve found (and I’ve spent HOURS looking through all the different backpacks that are this style). Also bummed it only has 3 interior elastic pockets instead of 4 like my old one. I’m sure these pockets will fray/tear within a year because my old bag was higher quality than this and is frayed on these interior pockets which is why I got a new bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kally

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper bag! It is so spacious and has so many pockets! I love that you can access the diaper bag from the back in addition to the top. The only thing I am not 100% on is the stroller clip which doesn’t hold as well as our last diaper bag. But this is definitely not a deal breaker and I can see us using this for many years to come! This is a great bag, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Huge and lovely
customer_reviews.text: So I have been looking for a big enough diaper bag for my toddler and now I have another baby on the way so I really need a big one. I have searched and spent way to much money on more then 4 diaper bags. So I found this one and the reviews sounded promising. Today the bag finally came and I love it!! It is huge and looks very sturdy I can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: KALEITHIA

customer_reviews.title: Amazed for the price..
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I am pleasantly surprised with this bag! It's super roomy yet lightweight. Its great quality material and very durable. My only concern is the way the zipper is attached, ibfeel it will detach with a lot of use. So far so good though and it's been over a month we have been using it.
customer_reviews.author: RiMarkable

customer_reviews.title: Great diaper backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love it being a backpack and having my hands free. However, I wish the zippers were more heavy duty or stronger. Most of the zippers had an opening in their zipped up state, meaning the teeth of the zippers did not fit correctly. Also, it is difficult to zip up the bag when it is full. I’m always worried about the zipper breaking, and as a busy mom of two, I would like to be able to zip things up and go in a split second and not have to sit there and fiddle around with the zippers. Other than that, I think it’s a great product so far!
customer_reviews.author: Hyunkyu Son

customer_reviews.title: Cute! And light weight!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t put this bag to use yet, but I have packed it! I’m not due until June so I packed it for baby for the hospital and haven’t felt like unpacking and repacking to use for my toddler lol. So far I like it and am hoping it holds up well! I would’ve preferred the black bag, but I hate the inside color of the black one, so grey it was! Plus the grey was cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bag at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for an even better price! I bought a backpack diaper bag from a well known expensive designer company that I just knew would be perfect for our trip for Disney. But I was so disappointed with the poor design decisions that when my kea babies backpack came in, I made a last second decision to take it instead. Best decision ever. I had over 50 items in this bag. The metal in the top holds open the bag fully. The pockets are plentiful and make sense. The access at the bottom of the bag was helpful. Wonderful design either parent would like to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great design, but not the strongest
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore the functionality, capacity, and design of this bag. But was very disappointed with the quality of the seams. The seam on the front pouch came undone after using the bag only twice. I still use the bag and plan to try to fix the rip though because this bag is by far my favorite diaper bag, and I've tried a few kinds. Other than the one little seam the only other issue I have is the snap on the top handles is not strong enough to hold a full bag. I'm unable to hang the bag on a stroller or shopping cart and wind up carrying or putting it inside the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R.

product_meta.title: Diaper Bag Backpack - Large Waterproof Travel Baby Bags (Classic Gray)
feature_bullets: DURABLE & LASTING - Made with Premium Oxford Fabric which is water resistant and scratch proof, your KeaBabies Diaper Bag will bring you anywhere without breaking. Your best travel companion after your baby!
SMOOTH ZIPPERS - High quality zippers can make a whole world of difference for backpack users. Our zippers are so easy to use that makes taking things in and out of the bag hassle free.

COMES WITH DIAPER MAT - Changing your baby made easy with our large diaper changing mat which is included inside each bag. Comes with a waterproof surface for you to clean it with sanitizer after use.
MULTI-FUNCTIONAL - Our highly raved diaper bag is loved by mommies and daddies for all the thoughtful pockets and compartments designed to make the bag practical for everyday outdoor needs.

HANDS FREE EVERYWHERE YOU GO - Carry our KeaBabies Diaper Bag Backpack with ease while using a baby carrier or carrying your baby. Hang it on your stroller or pram with the clip on holder straps. Stay hands free all day long while you tend to your little one!

specifications.Additional product features: Water-resistant & Comes With Large Changing Mat
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,632 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
